description.value:
You've made additions to your invention to upgrade your offensive capabilities. Your improvements make any Strikes that rely on your invention deal an additional 1d6 damage, with a type determined by the boost you choose. If your invention is magitek armor, the boost applies to your melee unarmed Strikes and to your melee Strikes with your engineer's multi-tool; if your invention is the skysteel multi-tool, the boost applies to Strikes with your engineer's multi-tool; if your invention is the magitek mech, the boost applies to your mech’s Strikes and attached weapons, and if your invention is a magitek pawn, the boost applies to your construct’s Strikes.

You can spend downtime to switch to a different boost in the same way as switching your modification. Choose one of the following boosts, with the damage type in parentheses.

  • Chill (@Localize[PF2E.TraitCold]) Your invention rapidly absorbs heat, creating an intense chill.
  • Dust (Earth) Your invention follows attacks with fine particulates like glass.
  • Gust (Wind) Your invention blasts foes with biting winds.
  • Ignition (Fire) Your invention shoots out gouts of searing flame.
  • Jet (Water) Your invention fires powerful jets of water.
  • Jolt (@Localize[PF2E.TraitElectricity]) Your invention shocks foes with charges of electricity.
  • Momentum (Bludgeoning) Your invention slams into foes with added momentum.
  • Saws (Slashing) Your invention reveals spinning saw blades during your attacks.
  • Spike (Piercing) Your invention reveals wicked spikes during your attacks.

Note: The included effect is only needed for magitek pawns.
